system.description:
The ability to find and identify individual types of plant; an important skill for alchemists, physicians, and apothecaries. Skilled gatherers earn a reasonable living.

When trying to find and gather specific plants in the natural environment, test Herblore once per watch (four hours) of searching. EML is modified according to the plant's rarity. Seeking a plant in an inappropriate locale should further reduce EML, perhaps to zero.
